alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Bay; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Inland Wakulla; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 7:09PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Gulf, southeastern Bay and southwestern Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, Wakulla, Liberty and Franklin Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 815 PM EDT/715 PM CDT/... At 708 PM EDT/608 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 17 miles west of Blountstown to near St. Marks. Movement was south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, Eastpoint, Apalachicola, St. Marks, Crawfordville, St George Island, Port St. Joe, Mexico Beach, Stonemill Creek, Tyndall Air Force Base, Orange, Franklin, Wewahitchka, Sopchoppy, Honeyville, Jewel Fire Tower, Vilas, Chipola Cutoff, St George Island St Pk and Cape San Blas. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Bay; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Inland Wakulla; Liberty
